pullRequest.title: [#10015] Add "Sort By" in Student-Course-Details-Page
pullRequest.bodyText:
Part of #10015
In this PR I have added only the "sort by" functionality!
Outline of Solution
When the user clicks on a "sort by" buton, the function sortTeammatesBy(by: SortBy) is triggered which triggers the function sortPanelsBy(by: SortBy). After that, the array teammateProfiles is properly sorted and displayed.
Question to reviewers
Should I add tests about this?

commit.message: [#9996] Fix pop-up message in Student List page
Add search bar & sort by options
Remove extra space from 'Sort By body' & add snapshots

nodes.bodyText: Could consider renaming by with sortOption for clarity, along with the rest of its uses in this file

I think this is the wrong place to add the sort method if you want the page to be sorted when it is loaded. However, to make it work, it will be a little bit complicated.
I accept the solution that we can just set teammateProfilesSortBy to SortBy.None and don't sort it when the page is loaded (i.e. remove this line).
Let me know if you want to take challenge to make it sorted when the page is loaded.
